articles.title: Report: Brentford 2 Strasbourg 2 - News - Official website of Brentford Football Club - Brentford FC
articles.description:
We ended our pre-season tour of Germany by drawing 2-2 with RC Strasbourg at Obere Wiesen.
Yoane Wissa and Keane Lewis-Potter scored a goal in each half as RCS had Ludovic Ajorque to thank for both of their strikes, KLP netting his first in red and white stri…
